title: Control
description: Contains a form element, e. g. a text input

scope.description: A json pointer referring to the form element in the forms json schema

options.title: Options
options.description: Gives multiple options to configure the element

label.description: Defines whether the fields label is activated

multi.description:
If set true, textarea will be shown instead of textfield. 
 Alternatively can be set to the number of wanted lines

rating.description: If set to true, numberfield will appear as star-rating-field

placeholder.description: Will be shown as placeholder in form fields, if supported by field

drop-placeholder.description: Will be shown as placeholder in file upload field when file drag and drop

allowMultipleFiles.description: Allows the upload of multiple files with fileupload

enumTitles.title: Titles for enum
enumTitles.description: If the text in a enums select field is supposed to differ from the keys, they can be specified as properties of this object. The value in the enum must be used as property name

radiobuttons.description: If set to true, a group of radiobuttons will be shown instead of the select field

stacked.description: Radiobutton-/Checkbox group will be stacked if set to true

buttons.title: Buttons
buttons.description: Render fields that support it (Radiobuttons, Checkboxgroups) as Buttons

oneOf.description: set to true, if should be rendered as buttons

switch.title: Switch(es)
switch.description: If set to true, the checkbox(-group) it was specified for will be rendered as switch(es)

autocomplete.description: Specifies what should be autocompleted by the browser. Possible values are listed here: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/autocomplete#values

textAlign.description: Set the text-align of input fields

hidden.description: Sets the visibility of the field to hidden. For example useful in combination with a DateTime field with default:"$now" to create a hidden timestamp.
